attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want to abolish the act of union, this is becuase english laws can be dipicted by scottish people, yet it doesnt work the other way around. This petition is for the devolution of the act of union making England, Nothern Ireland, Scottland and Wales their own countries and enabling them to make their own laws

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
